title: House Session
description: The U.S. House of Representative met and opened with one-minute speeches. Then the House proceeded to Legislative Business. The House voted on Investor Lawsuits - on agreeing to the conference report H.R. 1058. The original version of the Bill was passed in March '1995 - 325-99. The conference report was agreed to. Appropriations Bills were debated and voted on. The Legislative Business ended and the House proceeded with special order speeches.
cleaned_text: Carolina House Session The U.S. House of Representative met and opened with one-minute speeches. Then the House proceeded to Legislative Business. The House voted... [read more ](#) The U.S. House of Representative met and opened with one-minute speeches. Then the House proceeded to Legislative Business. The House voted on Investor Lawsuits - on agreeing to the conference report H.R. 1058. The original version of the Bill was passed in March '1995 - 325-99. The conference report was agreed to. Appropriations Bills were debated and voted on. The Legislative Business ended and the House proceeded with special order speeches.
